languages.text: "Кляйн винил мутантов, а оказалось, что это происки демонопоклонников".
"It seems that Klein was too quick to blame the mutants. We are dealing with daemon worshippers here."
languages.original_text: "Кляйн винил мутантов, а оказалось, что это происки демонопоклонников".

traits.locale_text: "It seems Klein was too quick to blame the mutants. We are dealing with daemon worshippers here."
"It seems Klein was too quick to blame the mutants. We are dealing with daemon worshippers here."
"It seems that Klein was too quick to blame the mutants. We are dealing with daemon worshippers here."
"It seems that Klein was too quick to blame the mutants. We are dealing with daemon worshippers here."
"It seems that Klein was too quick to blame the mutants. We are dealing with daemon worshippers here."
"It seems that Klein was too quick to blame the mutants. We are dealing with daemon worshippers here."

languages.text: « Apparemment, Klein a été un peu trop vite en besogne en accusant les mutants. De toute évidence, nous avons affaire à des adorateurs de démons. »
languages.original_text: "It seems that Klein was too quick to blame the mutants. We are dealing with daemon worshippers here."

traits.locale_text: « Apparemment, Klein a été un peu trop vite en besogne en accusant les mutants. De toute évidence, nous avons affaire à des adorateurs de démons. »

languages.text: «Parece que Klein se ha precipitado en culpar a los mutantes. Estamos tratando con adoradores de daemons».
languages.original_text: "It seems that Klein was too quick to blame the mutants. We are dealing with daemon worshippers here."

traits.locale_text: «Parece que Klein se ha precipitado en culpar a los mutantes. Estamos tratando con adoradores de daemons».

languages.text: “克莱因认为幕后黑手是变种人，这个结论似乎有点下得太早了。我们要对付的是崇拜恶魔的邪教徒。”
languages.original_text: "It seems that Klein was too quick to blame the mutants. We are dealing with daemon worshippers here."

traits.locale_text: “克莱因认为幕后黑手是变种人，这个结论似乎有点下得太早了。我们要对付的是崇拜恶魔的邪教徒。”

languages.text: 「クラインすぐ変異体のせいにしてしまう。我々はディーモン崇拝者を相手にしているのだ」
languages.original_text: "It seems that Klein was too quick to blame the mutants. We are dealing with daemon worshippers here."

traits.locale_text: 「クラインすぐ変異体のせいにしてしまう。我々はディーモン崇拝者を相手にしているのだ」

languages.text: "Offenbar hat Klein die Mutanten etwas zu voreilig beschuldigt. Wir haben es hier mit Dämonenanbetern zu tun."
languages.original_text: "It seems that Klein was too quick to blame the mutants. We are dealing with daemon worshippers here."

traits.locale_text: "Offenbar hat Klein die Mutanten etwas zu voreilig beschuldigt. Wir haben es hier mit Dämonenanbetern zu tun."

languages.text: "Görünüşe göre Klein, mutantları suçlamakta acele etti. Karşımızda iblis müritleri var."
languages.original_text: "It seems that Klein was too quick to blame the mutants. We are dealing with daemon worshippers here."
